				Vasquez Law Firm provides the information on this website for general informational purposes only. By accessing and using this website, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

 No Legal Advice

The content provided on this website, including but not limited to articles, blog posts, videos, and other materials, is for general informational purposes only. It is not intended as legal advice and should not be relied upon as such. Legal advice is specific to individual circumstances and should only be provided by an attorney after a formal consultation.

 Attorney-Client Relationship

The use of this website, including sending emails or submitting contact forms, does not create an attorney-client relationship. An attorney-client relationship is only established once both parties have signed a written agreement, and a retainer has been established.

 Accuracy of Information

While we make reasonable efforts to provide accurate and up-to-date information, Vasquez Law Firm does not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information provided on this website. The law is constantly evolving, and the information on this website may not reflect the most current legal developments.

 External Links

Our website may contain links to third-party websites for informational purposes. Vasquez Law Firm does not control, endorse, or assume responsibility for the content, privacy practices, or accuracy of these third-party websites.

 No Guarantee of Results

Any testimonials or case results mentioned on this website are not indicative of future results. Every case is unique, and past performance is not a guarantee of future success. The outcome of any legal matter depends on many factors, including the specific facts and circumstances of each case.

 Confidentiality

Please be aware that information transmitted through this website, including via email or contact forms, is not secure. Vasquez Law Firm cannot guarantee the confidentiality of information sent through these channels, and therefore, you should not send any confidential or sensitive information until an attorney-client relationship has been formally established.

 No Warranties

Vasquez Law Firm makes no representations or warranties about the completeness, reliability, or accuracy of the content provided on this website. The website is provided “as is,” and we do not warrant that it will be error-free or uninterrupted.

 Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, Vasquez Law Firm shall not be liable for any damages or losses arising out of or in connection with your use of this website, including, but not limited to, any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages.

 Changes to This Disclaimer

We reserve the right to update or modify this Disclaimer at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and by continuing to use our website, you agree to the updated terms.

 Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Disclaimer or any legal concerns, please contact us:
Vasquez Law FirmEmail: wvasquez@vasquezlawfirm.comPhone: 1-866-931-4454Address: 4426 Louisburg Rd, Raleigh, NC 27616, United States

				Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC has four convenient offices including Raleigh, Charlotte, and Smithfield, North Carolina and Orlando, Florida. We serve clients throughout surrounding areas including but not limited to Johnston County, Wake County, Mecklenburg County, Wake Forest, Durham, Chapel Hill, Apex, Knightdale, Cary, Garner, and Clayton, NC.
